title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value that is set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a list box parameter in the Edit Parameter dialog, the previous default value 'aa' is not retained and gets replaced by the new value 'aaa'.
EB: The default value 'aa' should be retained in the Edit Parameter dialog even after modifying it to 'aaa'.
SR:
1. Create a report parameter and set its Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as default. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Verify that the default value is still set as 'aaa' instead of reverting back to 'aa'.
